nodes.text: The Slinani were a religious warrior clan that constructed Migration Shrines that stored their battle trophies. One such shrine was Red Mist, located in the Outer Rim Territories.

The Slinani were first mentioned in the comic Doctor Aphra 32, written by Simon Spurrier and published by Marvel Comics on May 8, 2019. The following issue, also written by Spurrier and published on June 19, 2019, misspells the Slinani's name as "Slilani."
